subSubSection.paragraph: Canada, United States, Mexico, Cuba, Dominican Republic, Puerto Rico, U.S. Virgin Islands, Jamaica, Belize, Guatemala, Honduras, St. Martin, St. Kitts & Nevis, Antigua & Barbuda, Guadeloupe, Nicaragua, Dominica, St. Lucia, St. Vincent & Grenadines, Barbados, Aruba, Colombia, Curacao , Klein Curacao , Bonaire, Grenada, Venezuela, Costa Rica, Trinidad & Tobago, Panama, Guyana, Brazil, Peru, Bolivia, Paraguay, Argentina, Hawaiian Islands.
Distribution in Brazil: AP, PA, AM, CE, PE, MT, RO, BA, GO, MG, MS, SP, RJ, PR, SC, RS.
